name: Cross-site Scripting
description: The software does not neutralize user-controllable input before it is placed in output that is used as a web page.
remediation: Sanitize and encode user supplied input.
Use a templating engine that automatically escapes dynamic values.

name: SQL Injection
description: The software constructs SQL statements directly from external input without sanitization.
remediation: Employ an ORM that parameterizes statements by default.
